title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: When you want to invest in Bitcoin don't because people is investing in Bitcoin and you invest, I prefer taking my time to make a research before I invest on Bitcoin, Bitcoin invest is good but when you don't take your time to invest in Bitcoin then you will invest wrongly, the first time I invested I did not follow anyone step rather I do follow the research I made before I invest, some persons does not control emotions before they invest they follow a side news to invest on Bitcoin and that is why some of them do experience hard luck for their invest, in summary invest when you want to invest, don't follow the crowd but follow your instinct

comments.author: mrust_mobile
comments.body: True. If you invest in btc just because other people are also investing, then you will also be selling btc when they are selling and in my experience, the majority are always the losers. That means if you don't sell before everybody else, you will be selling at the bottom. If you don't buy before everybody, you will be buying the top. Following the majority the quickest way of getting poor.On the top of that, people need to understand what they are buying or selling. That's why they need to do their research before even touching btc or any other crypto. There are many resources that educates people for free. "Price is what you pay, value is what you get."

I mean it's all over the media, it has it's historical past and we see it as the prime mover and in it's young data, you can see that after the halving, price goes on a parabolic rise and then we see it hitting new all time high. And if you will follow the crowd then maybe you will see some saying that altcoins are also a good investment, even better than Bitcoin because it's gives you a higher return. It might be true, but it's not that easy to find a altcoin that will give you that so called x100 returns in the future. Perhaps what you hear in the beginning about Bitcoin is that it's a "get rich quick" scheme, and you fall for that hype or be influence by others that you think it's going to be very easy sail, which is not.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: We are in bitcoin forum and every information on bitcoin and technology is being discussed here. Price speculations and how to go about your bitcoin investment is also being discussed, so I don't see why anyone here in this forum will start making too much research on bitcoin, when he already have the basic knowledge of bitcoin. It is people who thinks that bitcoin is a get rich quick scheme, that will be carried away by FOMO and jump into investing without knowing how bitcoin works.Anyone that is ready to invest in bitcoin, as long you are active in this forum, it is easy as you can invest in bitcoin and continue learning more about bitcoin, you must not know everything first before you start up your investment because time waits for no one, and it is impossible for you to learn everything on bitcoin in one year, because bitcoin is complex and there are new developments in the network frequently. What I will say is that make a proper calculation on your income, and use the amount of discretionary income that you have to buy bitcoin, regular either weekly or monthly with DCA method, amd learn at the same time on bitcoin here in the forum. Investment should be a personal decision , and not because others are doing it.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: In general, I agree someone shouldn't only riding the wave without any knowledge. Because they need to learn about the reason they want to invest in Bitcoin except the price, non custodial wallet, how to backup their seed phrase, choosing CEX or DEX and basic computer security. But if someone buy Bitcoin without learn anything, it's still a good choice if they didn't panic sell and can hold for long term. The biggest mistake that did by Average Joe is sell the coins when it doesn't move like what they expect.

comments.author: CryptoBuds
comments.body: I completely agree with what you said and besides that I also want to emphasize to those who like to give bitcoin investment advice to others. We should limit cramming or convincing someone to invest in bitcoin when they don't know anything about it. Instead, give them basic knowledge about bitcoin and let them decide for themselves whether to invest in it or not. Many bitcoin investors are ignoring the risks and fluctuations of bitcoin and giving investment advice to others just because they want bitcoin to quickly become popular. But this will not help bitcoin become popular quickly, on the contrary, it could damage bitcoin's reputation as well as harm those who receive advice from us.

comments.author: MeGold666
comments.created_time: May 01, 2024, 11:19:51 AMLast edit: May 01, 2024, 12:05:25 PM by MeGold666
comments.body: The problem is that people shouldn't be only investing in cryptocurrencies but instead using them as they are using regular banks and FIAT money - for a secure store of money and to be used everyday.Unfortunately most people got into cryptocurrency world due to countless stories of getting rich and they missed the point entirely, bought into X project and started mindlessly copy/pasting glorifying posts about it to hopefully increase their bags value which in the long term only hurts the value.If people would stop posting "HODL" and "Number goes up" threads and instead just used it as it supposed to be used (without CEX or any custodial wallet!) then the price would naturally go up anyway but would be more stable because it would be propelled by true usage and not mainly by speculators and their pumpy-dumpy scheme.Speculators who earn by pumping and dumping would still exist but the percentage of impact on the price would be much smaller as users (as oppose to hodlers) would have more moving force than them.By only holding (not using it) the true value disappears and what we get is a bubble of greater fool.I'm not saying you shouldn't use it as investment at all, you can just like you can FIAT money from different countries but mainly it should be used.Hodler = Zombie coins.If you're not using it, you are not participating in the market and actually making it weaker by handing more power to speculators who don't want for the "number" to go up but fluctuate, the more drastic the fluctuation the more gains they have.Cryptocurrency is not "Digital Gold", never was, never will. It is Digital Money.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: You will need to get your plan when you want to invest because not all people have the same capital for their investment and when you want to mimic the other's strategies, you better not do like those who invest big money while you are struggling with your financial needs. It's up to you to invest but to go overboard will cause more harm to you than benefit because the crypto market is volatile and you will have lots of depress moments before you actually see the results of your investment. You just need to follow the simple rules, where you invest what you can afford to lose and do it your own way no the other way around.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Do not invest in something that you do not understand anything about, or at least do not have basic knowledge about.Investing in Bitcoin is good for those who want a stable, long-term investment and do not think about withdrawing their money within the next 6 years. However, for those who want a quick profit and wealth, Bitcoin is not the most suitable investment for that.
